title: Around the AFC in 48 Minutes
itunes:title: Around the AFC in 48 Minutes
description:
A room filled with heroes – Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal & Patrick Claybon– recap all the latest news from around the NFL including Julian Edelman injury result, the Vontaze Burfict suspension and Hurricane Harvey fallout. The heroes go around the AFC in 48 minutes in speed rounds giving you everything you need to know about each team in the AFC.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
